meanings.sent1: She interfolded the papers neatly before putting them away.
meanings.sent2: The fabric was interfolded to create a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent3: The chef interfolded the ingredients with precision, like a master artist.
meanings.sent4: Their destinies interfolded like the pages of a thrilling novel.
meanings.sent5: The branches of the trees interfolded, creating a natural canopy above.

meanings.sent1: The interfolded layers of the pastry made it flaky and delicious.
meanings.sent2: The interfolded blankets kept them warm on the cold night.
meanings.sent3: The interfolded ribbons on the gift box looked like a colorful braid.
meanings.sent4: The interfolded hands of the lovers symbolized their unity and strength.
meanings.sent5: The interfolded petals of the flower gave it a unique and intricate appearance.
